title: Rugby World Cup 2019 fixtures and results: Every score so far, plus remaining match dates
text:
The 2019 Rugby World Cup is now well underway as teams start to secure their places in the quarter-finals.

Here is the full list of fixtures for the 20 countries competing, along with the results of the tournament so far.

Where is the tournament being held?

Japan. See the full list of stadiums hosting the games.

The host nation had an excellent start to the competition, by winning their first game against Russia. They then went on to defeat Ireland, the world's second-ranked team, in one of the biggest shock victories of the tournament so far.

Who are the competing teams?
description: The 2019 Rugby World Cup is now well underway as teams start to secure their places in the quarter-finals.
